trans-unit.target: TEXT_BANGNA305_02265_SEQ_00<tab>The Vath keeneye's beady eyes look at you expectantly. ※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

TEXT_BANGNA305_02265_SEQ_01<tab>The hunters of Tailfeather have requested a particular set of goods found only within Loth ast Gnath. Unable to sneak past their heightened security, the Vath keeneye asks you to raid the enemy settlement in his stead. Your goal is to procure three jars of a special paste and three bags of blackloam.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANGNA305_02265_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained the jars of paste and bags of blackloam. Return quickly to Loth ast Vath and deliver them to the Vath keeneye.

TEXT_BANGNA305_02265_SEQ_03<tab>The Vath keeneye is pleased to see you return safely. As you hand over the spoils taken from the Gnath stronghold, you cannot help but notice his quizzical expression. He tells you these items are a special food reserved for soldiers of the Onemind, which is why he is so puzzled by the hunters' plans. The paste, he says, will be used for rearing chocobos. Though admittedly strange by his standards, this is a reasonable use for such nutritious food. However, he seems more perplexed by their intended use of the blackloam, which the hunters refer to as manure...
TEXT_BANGNA305_02265_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the paste and blackloam to the Vath keeneye.
TEXT_BANGNA305_02265_SEARCHER_000_000<tab>Thank goodness you are here. <click> <click> We have received a request from Tailfeather, and we fear only you can complete it.

TEXT_BANGNA305_02265_SEARCHER_000_001<tab>They ask for special paste and loam, but these are not found in Loth ast Vath. No, only the Gnath colony has what they seek. Please, you must sneak into the colony and take them for us. Three bags of each should be all we require.

TEXT_BANGNA305_02265_SEARCHER_000_002<tab>Be warned, great hunter. The Gnath have strengthened their defenses. We tried to sneak in, but there were too many guards. <click> <click> It will be difficult to enter with so many guards on patrol. Yes, very difficult.
TEXT_BANGNA305_02265_SEARCHER_000_010<tab>Welcome back, great hunter. Were you able to find the special paste and loam?

TEXT_BANGNA305_02265_SEARCHER_000_011<tab>This is it! You have done well. Yes, very well. <click> <click> These are a special food, reserved for elite soldiers of the Onemind, but fleshling hunters seem to misunderstand their purpose.

TEXT_BANGNA305_02265_SEARCHER_000_012<tab>The paste will be given to chocobo chicks for rearing. We were not allowed to eat this paste, but it is said to be very nourishing. I suppose chocobo chicks will benefit from its nutrients.

TEXT_BANGNA305_02265_SEARCHER_000_013<tab>The loam is the most nutritious of all. Yes, very nutritious. We find it strange the hunters will use this for planting gysahl greens, rather than eating. Fleshlings call it by another name. Manure, was it...? <click> <click>
TEXT_BANGNA305_02265_SEARCHER_000_014<tab>We cannot remember. Still, we thank you, great hunter. When next great task comes, we will be sure to call.
